definition: a holdup man who stops a vehicle and steals from it
details:
noun
- a holdup man who stops a vehicle and steals from it
= synonyms: highwayman, hijacker, road agent
- someone who uses force to take over a vehicle, especially an airplane, in order to reach an alternative destination
= example: someone who uses force to take over a vehicle, especially an airplane, in order to reach an alternative destination
= synonyms: hijacker
